description: This file contains implementation code for telemetry data profile management in a software component, including functions to get and set profile data in JSON and MsgPack formats, as well as accessing memory usage stats.

methods.name: ULONG Telemetry_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves profile data in string format (JSON or MsgPack) or temporary buffers based on parameter name.

methods.name: BOOL Telemetry_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Updates profile data in string format, handling JSON or MsgPack profiles, and manages internal memory buffers accordingly.

methods.name: BOOL Telemetry_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,unsigned int * pValue)
methods.description: Retrieves unsigned long parameter value, such as total used memory.

ctags.name: Telemetry_GetParamStringValue
ctags.pattern: /^ULONG Telemetry_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, char* pValue, ULON/

ctags.name: Telemetry_SetParamStringValue
ctags.pattern: /^BOOL Telemetry_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, char* pString)$/
